name: JNIAnalyzer
description: Analysis scripts for Binary Ninja to work with Android NDK libraries.
longdescription: This plugin contains several functions that aid in the analysis of Android native libraries.

installinstructions.Darwin: Follow the [installation instructions](https://github.com/Ayrx/binja-JNIAnalyzer#installation) to setup the required dependencies.
installinstructions.Linux: Follow the [installation instructions](https://github.com/Ayrx/binja-JNIAnalyzer#installation) to setup the required dependencies.
